decoworld.model.world.entities

Class GenericChicken

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.GenericChicken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasCollision, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem

    public class GenericChicken
extends WorldEntity
implements HasCollision
    The GenericChicken Entity A simple entity that follows the player around the screen. This chicken represents the initial implementation of the Random Events framework. Original code was duplicated GenericMobSprite class
